response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional opportunity tailored to meet your needs and expectations. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth every penny. However, to make this proposition more attractive, I am offering the product to you for $14,000. This price reflects its high quality and the significant benefits it will bring to you. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your budget and preferences, so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 14000}
